attributes.additional_details:
Students like me will have no time with teachers before our examinations to have help with quick revision. Last term, our lessons were disturbed with teachers being absent due to covid and with students with covid. Me and many others do not find it fair that we will have to sit these exams and not others in the summer. 
I ask the government to reconsider cancelling these examinations.
attributes.background: I would like the government to cancel January exams for students who are due to sit them. I do not find it fair or right that we should have to go into college and sit them.
